{"id":922824042,"question_id":2476,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"11 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1679895779,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"11 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/922824042/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Check Distances Between Same Letters","memory":"13.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    bool checkDistances(string s, vector<int>& distance) {\n        for(auto &i: distance) i++;\n        map<char, int> m;\n        for(int i = 0; i < s.size(); i++){\n            if(!m[s[i]]) m[s[i]] = i + 1;\n            else{\n                if(i + 1 - m[s[i]] != distance[s[i] - 'a']) return false;\n            }\n        }\n        return true;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"check-distances-between-same-letters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
